title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config & data into a single Modelfile and serves them via an OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for Ollama—stream chats, embeddings, pulls and local model management in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; one-line install via pip, sync & async APIs, chat, generate, embeddings, model pulling.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embeddings and chat wrappers for LangChain chains & agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; markdown, code highlighting, model manager, multi-user, Docker ready.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI chat client for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history and REPL mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns local Ollama models into inline GitHub Copilot-style suggestions; supports Code Llama & StarCoder.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming/non-streaming chat, embeddings, model management, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for building retrieval-augmented pipelines locally.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: Docker Compose stacks, GPU tuning, Kubernetes manifests, fine-tuning scripts and example apps for Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript SDK; 100 kB, zero dependencies, ESM & CommonJS builds, 1 k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package; wheels for macOS/Linux/Windows, 3.8-3.12 support, async & sync clients, 10 k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate offering strongly typed async client for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model ops, tokio based.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; idiomatic Go API, streaming support, model management, MIT licensed.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server; slash commands, thread conversations, rate limits.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + FAISS; ingest PDFs, query with local embeddings, no cloud calls.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models via Slack slash commands; ephemeral or threaded replies, admin allowlist.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for talking to Ollama; streams completions into Flutter widgets, null-safe, pub.dev published.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter template wiring Ollama JS SDK to a REST/GraphQL gateway; includes Docker, tests, rate-limit & auth examples.
